caption: Took my wife here for a date night and we were both pleasantly surprised...the food was "amazing!!!" We had pizza and salad, and the pizza flavor was so authentic and the crust super thin and soft. The garlic bites were the best I ever had.
Been going here for over 15 years and their pizza is made with Brazil love.Great flavor and professional service

I. Love. Amazonas. We started going here for pizzas when we lived in the building on the corner. They have fantastic plain and pepperoni slices for the nights where you just need a quick, single serving slice. To be honest, their …
Always the best:  Spinach, Feta Cheese, & Sundried Tomato pizza.  You'll never go back to Pepperoni...EVER.

Really solid, standard fare pizza from a family owned, local shop. The regular crust pizzas are doughy with a nice char on the bottom. They do not skimp on their toppings, which are of good quality. This is comfort pizza that I will order …
I went and picked up my pizza it was great no problems. My total was 28.68 i paid with my Card i get Home checked my account it says 34.68 spent They stole 7.00$From me and thats not cool at all
I certainly enjoy the food and service, awesome location right next to where I live. The staff members are always very nice. I highly recommend this place.

I had the best and tasty Spaghetti with Meatballs in this Italian restaurant. We had our lunch here yesterday with my friends and it was my first time in the restaurant. They never failed my first time here, as I have tasted their delicious pasta and drinks. The ambiance was very classic with a touch of elegance.
Extra sauce 🤤

Wow! Amazona's is easily the best pizza I've had in Oakland. We are about to move away and after living right down the street from here for over a year, we are so regretful we never tried it sooner! As an east coaster I can say New York …
The spot is a walk up booth. The pizza was excellent. This is my new favorite spot in Oakland, CA.
The sauce is to too sweet
GREAT PEPPERONI SPINACH PIZZA100%

Came here during the shelter in place order on 3-28-20. People were very friendly. Could only take food to go.  Tried the NY style pizza. It was delicious! They recommended "where the pork has no name" because it was one of the most popular.  Lots of meat and the sauce was spot on!  Definitely will be back for more great pizza.

Great pizza joint!! Definitely not overpriced but not cheap either. We got a 14 inch with two drinks for about $30. Two of us were able to finish the pan easily. The pineapples were 👌🏼👌🏼 and the crust was delicious. Definitely recommend to stop by for some casual pizza

Yesterday was our first time we came to that place. But It is no doubt not the last. We passed a splendid evening with the excellent service, with the first-rate  meal and wine and with the friendly payment. We will absolutely visit there soon.
Some of the best pizza in the East Bay or Bay Area
They have beef pepperoni.  So happy
This spot is worth a visit. They serve large portions for fair prices. Regularly well organized and with fantastic atmosphere. Will come visit again.
Great pizza! There are many different kinds and they are all tasty. They have great slices and whole pies. Definitely recommended!
Garlic Chicken & Bacon with white sauce.🐓🥓
Hard to find accessible, good pizza in the bay area. This is our go to spot in Oakland.
Amazing pizza great staff.
The best tasting pizza in Oakland!
Pretty good.
Amazing
We order from them a lot for my job, they're our favorite.  Always helpful and on time!  The pizza- divine.
Best thin crust pizza around. I've been coming here for 17 years and they don't disappoint.
Usually has 2 or 3 pizza "by the slice" readily available.  Friendly staff.  Unfortunately closed on Sundays.
ALL the unique choices on their menu are wonderful. Definitely eat out however, the inside of the restaurant is cluttered and small. Fast delivery as well.
Cool spot! But while they told me it’d take 20 minutes.... it took one hour. Not coming back.
The best pizza in Oakland :)
Amazing pizza!  If your into New York pizza it's bomb.  Just get it.
Great pizza workers work really fast to help u
It was ok, but it made my stomach feel a little weird...
Great pizza.
Been coming here for over 5 years. Consistently great pizza. Favs are the siquiera and cacique.
Had a really tasty Caprese salad and pepperoni slice
I mean come on the slices are huge and super tasty
Site says open until 11pm. Went by at 10:15pm and they were closed.
Amazonas is a great place to go with your family. Try the siquera pizza.
Great Pizza!!! I was pleasantly surprised by this place.

I am definitely in love with this pizzeria! They serve the best pizzas in town and they have the most accommodating staffs ever. When our smoothies spilled on our table as fastly at it reached the floor, they instantly approached us and …
Was ok

Wow! This pizza is fabulous. Sour dough crust that's crispy on the bottom and soft on the top, really great variety of toppings, and delicious sauce, real mozzarella cheese that turns to strings when you get a slice from the pie. What more could you want in a pizza? This is the closest to ny style pizza that I've found in the bay area.
There was just one available cheese slice when I came by. It was not that good and unfortunately that is the one and only time I will ever visit.
It's was good
Great pizza
The pizza is great. They are pretty fast for a pizza store. Parking is not great, because it's in downtown Oakland. But other than that they're great.
My favorite pizza in the Bay Area.
No bathroom. No salt packets. Nice guys though.
Nice pizza and quite place!
Hidden gem. Delicioso!
Best pizza around. We go out of our way to get it.
Perfect place to enjoy a pizza there sauce is great and the crust give you a satisfying crunch
A really solid slice.
Great food

Are you aware that your website does not work? It's not possible to place an order. Also the pictures are all the same and there are numerous typos, misspellings, bad grammar, etc. You seem to make good pizza according to the reviews. How …

Great thin crust style pizza when you need a slice or a pie to hang out at the bar or watch a game. Crust is oh so crispy and sauce is tasty. You might be delightfully surprised, as inside this modest storefront is a damn good pizzeria!
It in the sauce made it own flavor hum. Great big slices of pizza. Excellent pizza crust was perfect. It wasn't to thick it  wasn't even dough. Perfect.
Best pizza around here.
Food for the soul
Best Pizza on Telegraph.  Hands down!

Solid, cheap slice. The pizza has that nice orange grease that runs off it - a staple of east coast pizza. Large staff, I think it is family run. They are from Brazil, hence the name Amazona's. Been here a few times and it was always solid. You can expect a good, if not mimd blowing slice.
The pizza is really nice. I've only gotten slices here, but they're fresh and the crust is crisp and chewy. My favorite pizza on Telegraph!
Really solid pies
My son and iove this place. Great place to stop in for a quick slice on First Friday.Nothing fancy, just a great slice of pizza the way I like it - cheesy, saucy, fresh.
Amazing taste !
I've been eating here 14 years and their Pizza is always good.
Best pizza ive had in years!
Best damn pizza I've ever had I think. I have not all the time with my wife. However!!!! They recently raised their prices a ALOT!!!! Booooo. Other wise awesome
The pizzas are thin and cheesy and very delicious, and the staff are nice.
Love pizza I will  order again ,good price thanks for the deliver it came fast too.
It's due in a pinch. Pretty fast and reliable, but there is fast better pizza to be had in the East Bay.
I have been around since their inception and that was over twelve years ago and I still enjoy their pizza 🍕!

Absolute diamond in the rough!  You would never guess what a wonderful place this is with the area of town it is in.  My wife and I were completely taken by surprise as to how tasty this pizza was.  This is the best pizza I've ever had.  We …
The best pizza ever. I love it.

I paid for a pizza to be delivered to someone three nights in a row.  I discovered that there had been a charge on the fourth night.  One I did not order.  I contacted my bank, they investigated, and I won the case.  Doesn't make me feel terribly good about Amazona's.  Sorry to say.

Not worth it. Well, the delivery was on time but the pizza wasn't worth the price at all. The sauce was good but the crust tasted just like box it came in.  I'd heard good things so I was truly disappointed. If you want pizza go to pizza love. it's crap pizza for a crap price. better than paying expensive price for crap pizza.
Make it a New York style and you'll never regret it. For delivery you can't beat it.

This is my favorite Oakland pizza place. Sometimes the wait can be a little long, but IT IS WORTH IT. Haven't had a bad pizza in ~2 years, and they deliver to every neighborhood in Oakland I've lived in.
Thought the pizza was great. Location & decor was questionable
Amazing pizza!

Their crust is a bit firm and tears a bit hard, but it is so delicious and bubbly. Great amount of ingredients - not too much, not too little (they definitely don't skimp, but they don't overload it so it isn't functionally edible. I love …

I love pizza. For the past 5 years I would say Amazonas has consistently impressed. Both in terms of food quality and service. Fresh garlic, great sausage, Wisconsin cheese. Always hot on delivery. I slept through a recent delivery attempt …
Very good food, I loved the pizza and the atmosphere.

We have used this restaurant to provide pizza for night classes for over a year and the quality is excellent.  They build us "variety" pizzas with two different toppings on one pie, so all our eaters are accommodated.  I simply call with …
